body: Thank you -- email received, will track progress with this issue. Will update description and title appropriately with more information.

rename.from: May be a new default typing gadget
rename.to: Block one more gadget type (ehcache, CVE to be allocated)

rename.from: Block one more gadget type (ehcache, CVE to be allocated)
rename.to: Block one more gadget type (ehcache, CVE-2019-17267)

issue.title: Please block two more gadget types (DUP)

labels.name: duplicate
labels.description: Duplicate of an existing (usually earlier) issue

repository.name: jackson-databind
repository.description: General data-binding package for Jackson (2.x): works on streaming API (core) implementation(s)

issue.body:
In jackson-databind 2.9.10, you have ban two gadget type ("net.sf.ehcache.transaction.manager.DefaultTransactionManagerLookup" and "net.sf.ehcache.hibernate.EhcacheJtaTransactionManagerLookup"). 
We found another two gadget types to bypass it. (follow up for #2387,#2460)
We have just sent you a mail.

issue.title: CVE-2019-17267 (High) detected in jackson-databind-2.9.1.jar - autoclosed
issue.body:
## CVE-2019-17267 - High Severity Vulnerability
Vulnerable Library - jackson-databind-2.9.1.jar

General data-binding functionality for Jackson: works on core streaming API

Library home page: http://github.com/FasterXML/jackson

Path to dependency file: /tmp/ws-scm/locadora/pom.xml

Path to vulnerable library: /root/.m2/repository/com/fasterxml/jackson/core/jackson-databind/2.9.1/jackson-databind-2.9.1.jar

Dependency Hierarchy: - spring-boot-starter-web-2.0.0.M5.jar (Root Library) - spring-boot-starter-json-2.0.0.M5.jar - :x: **jackson-databind-2.9.1.jar** (Vulnerable Library)

Found in HEAD commit: a6afc98d5fe2915efc904e448bc63fc5e0abe457

Vulnerability Details

A Polymorphic Typing issue was discovered in FasterXML jackson-databind before 2.9.10. It is related to net.sf.ehcache.hibernate.EhcacheJtaTransactionManagerLookup.

Publish Date: 2019-10-07

URL: CVE-2019-17267

CVSS 3 Score Details (9.8)

Base Score Metrics: - Exploitability Metrics: - Attack Vector: Network - Attack Complexity: Low - Privileges Required: None - User Interaction: None - Scope: Unchanged - Impact Metrics: - Confidentiality Impact: High - Integrity Impact: High - Availability Impact: High

For more information on CVSS3 Scores, click here.

Suggested Fix

Type: Upgrade version

Origin: https://github.com/FasterXML/jackson-databind/issues/2460

Release Date: 2019-10-07

Fix Resolution: com.fasterxml.jackson.core:jackson-databind:2.8.11.5,2.9.10
